name: Nisaba - Learn Science for Free!
description: Why is the sky blue? Why do monkeys have tails? What do plants eat? Why do things fall down? Discover the answer to these questions and so many more with the Nisaba app!  Learn by talking to famous scientists like Einstein, Newton and Darwin. They will take you on an adventure where you will discover the magic of science! Learning science has never been more fun!  Learn - Learn for free. Without any ads - Available now for class 3 to 8 - Cover the entire CBSE curriculum and more  Talk - Interact with famous scientists and hear their stories - Ask questions about the world around you - Funny jokes to keep you entertained  Play - Play and learn at the same time with exciting games - Graphics and animations make learning easier than ever before  Discover - Test what you have learned with challenging exercises - Keep track of your progress and achievements - Discover your own path! Content adapts to your preferences
